page.title: 08Employment,Gt.Asby
page.content: EMPLOYMENT Most people in our area are farmers. Some young people start farming when they leave school.Two or three men go to work at the police headquarters at Penrith.About two people go to work at garages.Four people drive wagons.We have three teachers in the village.A tanker driver lives outside the village who works for the dairy at Appleby.In our area very few people are unemployed. People get jobs from the dairy,police headquarters,shops and banks.The reason there aren't many unemployed people is that there aren't many people to be unemployed.
